name: Japanese Spiny Lobster
description: A few years prior, Kota Imai's box pleated design of a japanese spiny lobster gained a lot of attention for the sheer complexity that went into making all the spines and textures of a lobster. It has since become among the ranks of the ryujin 3.5 as one of the top landmarks of complex origami. Thus, since the beginning of my hp journey, it has been a goal of mine to recreate the JSL in hex pleating.
cpdescription: This could be described as "multiaxial" hex pleating, or you could call it normal hp with some really complicated level shifters. In any case, it uses a weird layout to create the solid width of the body
